subjects: You have been selected to get an exclusive $90 offer!
data.body:
LIMITED TIME OPPORTUNITY
Dear WebPay Customer!
You have been selected to get an exclusive $90 offer!
To qualify for this special offer, simply complete our 30-second marketing survey about your online payment experience.
 
Get Started
 
 
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may unsubscribe by clicking here or by writing to 143 Exchange Blvd Ste 300, Hutto, TX, 78634
